title: Structuring Narratives
text: Frameworks provide guidance for people who find it challenging to organize their thoughts.

hintAnswer: Provides a starting point and structure
title: Frameworks and Flexibility
text: How can story frameworks help individuals struggling with narrative structure?
choices: Provides a starting point and structure

title: One singular story framework might not work for every instance of a presentation.
Using a story framework might work well for some people, and be incompatible with people who have other ways of crafting narratives.
